mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT r.user_no, r.rsv_no, b.br_name, b.br_id, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = r.user_no) AS user_id, r.rsv_day, r.rsv_time, r.rsv_count, r.rsv_tel, r.rsv_price, r.rsv_name, r.rsv_state, r.rsv_fin_date, r.rsv_reply_yn, (select delete_yn from kap_user where user_no = r.user_no) as delete_yn FROM reserve r LEFT OUTER JOIN brewery b ON r.br_id = b.br_id ORDER BY r.rsv_no desc ) A WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and user_no=#{user_no} and delete_yn ='N' and rsv_reply_yn='N' )WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
